utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey! Out of all of us, who do you think is gonna get married next?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Probably Monica and Chandler.

utterance.speaker: Woman
utterance.content: Hi. Could I have a pack of Newport Lights, please?

utterance.speaker: Gunther
utterance.content: Oh umm, uh we don’t sell cigarettes, but they have them at the newsstand across the street.

utterance.speaker: Woman
utterance.content: That’d be great, thanks.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God, Melissa Warburton. I don’t think I have the energy for this.

utterance.speaker: Melissa
utterance.content: Oh my God! Ray-ray Green?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Melissa!

utterance.speaker: Melissa
utterance.content: You have been M.I.A for the past seven sorority newsletters, what’s up with you?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wh——Why don’t I tell you over here?

utterance.speaker: Melissa
utterance.content: So last I heard you were gonna get married. Oh poor Ray-ray.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh no-no, no! It’s good! It’s all good! I-I actually work at Ralph Lauren!

utterance.speaker: Melissa
utterance.content: Shut up!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I will not! I’m the divisional head of men’s sportswear!

utterance.speaker: Melissa
utterance.content: Oh shut up more! Now, are you friends with Ralph?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh please…

utterance.speaker: Melissa
utterance.content: Are you?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Melissa
utterance.content: Listen, we-we have to have dinner. What-what are you doing tomorrow night?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh tomorrow, oh I don’t know. Um…

utterance.speaker: Melissa
utterance.content: You do now. You’re having dinner with me.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Shut up.

utterance.speaker: Melissa
utterance.content: I-I’ve got to go. This has been so great Ray-ray! Oh, there you are. Umm, so listen, just call me. Here’s my card.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, wow thanks! Oh you’re in real estate!

utterance.speaker: Melissa
utterance.content: Oh no, that’s-that’s an old card. Umm, I wanted to get out of that and-and do something where I can really help people and-and make a difference.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wow! What do you do now?

utterance.speaker: Melissa
utterance.content: I’m a party planner. I’ll see you tomorrow.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey guys! Look who’s back! It’s Ray-ray!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Shut up that was my friend Melissa from college.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: She seems really, really fun!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: She’s actually very sweet and we used to be very close.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wait a minute, she isn’t… She’s not the one who you…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Who you what? Who you what?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yes.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wow!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Wow? Wow what?! Wow what?! Who you—what?!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: It’s not a big deal!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: They were lovers.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No we weren’t! It was nothing! It was one night, senior year we went to a party, had a lot of sangria and y’know, ended up…kissing for a bit.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So that’s two of my wives.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay so this is where the band is. And this is where the bar is. And all these pins have people’s names on them. And Rach, here you are.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh wow. Why don’t we just take me and put me with a Manhattan in my hand, talking to the cute bartender. These pins aren’t for playing are they?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, the red ones are my guests and the blue ones are yours.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: This is so sad. I mean, I only have like ten pins.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Chandler, relax it’s not a contest. Certainly not a close one.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hello!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey Rach.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Stop picturing it!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, I think that’s it. The seating chart is done. This is our wedding. They all look like they’re having fun don’t they?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, so where are my parents gonna be?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh! Let’s see, well…if this is the wedding hall then umm you’re parents will be at home in Queens.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What they’re not invited?! Oh no, that’s terrible! They’re gonna be crushed!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Why would they think they’re invited?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You got me. I don’t…

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Joey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, I’m sorry. I thought parents were coming! Y’know? Your parents are comin’! Chandler’s parents are comin’! Ross’s parents are comin’!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ross’s parents are my parents!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well-well—see? Parents are comin’!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Y’know I think we should invite them.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh please, you just want more blue pins.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well this is just sad!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All right, all right. Maybe I can fit them in if I just do some rearranging. But uh, Rachel may actually have to sit at the bar!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: That is not a problem.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Maybe you’ll order a little sangria?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, get out of here!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So now, these are all the tuxedos that we make and if there’s anything that you like, we can make you a deal. Anything at all. But these are the three that Monica pre-approved.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, thanks a lot for hookin’ me up Rach. I want you to know that I want you to attend our wedding as my guest.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I’m Monica’s maid of honor. Okay? Don’t try to blue pin me!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, what’s the deal with these? These-these look nice.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh they are nice. We-we custom-make tuxedos for celebrities and then when they’re done with them they just send ‘em back.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You mean like for award shows?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Some of them.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You mean these tuxes have been down the red carpet with people yelling, "You are you wearing?! You look fabulous!"

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Honey, might I suggest watching a little more ESPN and a little less E!?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, who wore those?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Umm, well let’s see uh, this one is Tom Brokaw.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Not bad.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: This one is uh Paul O’Neil.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Who’s that?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: He plays for the Yankees. Seriously, ESPN! Just once and a while, have it on in the background. Ooh, this one was Pierce Brosnan!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Pierce Brosnan?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Uh-huh.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Are you serious?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: 007?! This is James Bond’s tux?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, I have to get married in James Bond’s tux!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: It’s a pretty cool tux.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, it’s not just that, I would be England’s most powerful weapon. Jet setting heartbreaker on her majesty’s secret service. A man who fears no one; with a license to kill. Would Monica let me wear this?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: We should really learn how to play the real way.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I like our way. Oh! Chess!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Nice move.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So Joey I just hooked Ross and Chandler up with some tuxedos for the wedding, do you need one?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No, I’m performing the ceremony. I’m not wearing a tux.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, what are you going to wear?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Multi-colored robes! Ooh, and maybe a hat.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Huh. Does Monica know about this?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I don’t think so.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Can I please be there when you tell her?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey oh, Rach wait! Do you want to go to a movie tonight?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, y’know what? I can’t. I have to have dinner with that Melissa girl.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Can I come?! I won’t even talk! You’ll just hear the noise from my video camera.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What is this? What’s going on?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh good! Can I tell her?! Can I tell her?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, do you want to hear what actually happened or Joey’s lewd version?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Joey’s!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey, come on! I had this friend from college and I made the stupid mistake of telling Joey that one time…she and I y’know…kissed a little bit.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, I’m sure that happened.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: It-it did!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Sure!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey. It happened!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, it was senior year in college. It was after the Sigma Chi luau and Melissa and I got very drunk! And we ended up kissing! For several minutes!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Which means she had a couple spritzers and a quick peck on the cheek.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Why are you taking this away from me?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, why is it so hard for you to believe?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay! I just—I didn’t know that you are a lesbian.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I’m not saying that I’m a lesbian! I’m just saying that this happened!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, it just seems pretty wild and you’re so—y’know so…vanilla.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Vanilla?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I’m not vanilla! I’ve done lots of crazy things! I mean I got-I got drunk and married in Vegas!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: To Ross.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: All right, y’know what? If you don’t want to believe me about this, why don’t you just come with me to dinner tonight and she will tell you.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay! All right! Yeah! ‘Cause I just can’t picture it.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh-ho, you should get inside my head.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey! Guess what I got for your wedding!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: A freakish thin date with a hanger for her head?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No. Rachel hooked me up with a tux! But not just any tux, Batman’s tux!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That’s right! Made expressly for Val Kilmer and worn by him in the hit film…that Batman film he was in.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You can’t wear that! I’m wearing the famous tux! James Bond’s tux!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So—If you wear that you’ll make mine less special.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, you need something to make this day special? Hello! You-you-you have the most special thing of all! You are marrying the woman you love.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Please, don’t take away my cool thing. Please?! Pretty please?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Pretty please? Not very uh, 007.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Look, it’s my wedding day okay? If you were getting married I would never do anything to upset you.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: When I got married you slept with my sister.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That was pretty 007.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey. Oh good-good you’re here! All right, I figured it out. I’m gonna take two tables of eight, I’m gonna add your parents, and I’m gonna turn them into three tables of six. Okay? And I called the caterer; I added two extra meals, we are good to go!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, they’re not coming.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Somehow they got the idea that you only invited them because of me. They…feel a little unwanted.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh that’s too bad. It’s true, but too bad.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Look Mon, if you could just call my mom…

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh Joey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Come on! Look just-just tell—let her know that you really want them to be there. Let’s not forget, this is a woman that has sent you many lasagnas over the years.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No she hasn’t.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Is it her fault that some of them didn’t make it to you?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, what am I going to say?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I don’t know. Just uh, just tell ‘em it was a mix-up with the invitations, or—No-no-no! Blame it on the post office. They hate the post office. And the Irish! But I don’t think you can blame it on them so…

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hello? Yeah, hi! Mrs. Tribbiani? Hi, this is Monica Geller. Yeah I’m just calling to say that Chandler and I uh, really hope you can make it to the wedding. Yeah, apparently a bunch of invitations that we sent weren’t delivered. Umm, I guess there was some screw up at the damn post office! T-Tell me about it! Yeah, yeah, the US Post Office? No, more like US lost office! What are they Irish?!

utterance.speaker: Melissa
utterance.content: …anyway, his name is Allan and we’ve been going out for three years. He was my first client when I became a party planner. He was planning a party for his girlfriend at the time. Oh well. And he was Theta Beta Pi at Syracuse.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh. Oh, that’s great!

utterance.speaker: Melissa
utterance.content: Hmm Phoebe, were you ever in a sorority?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Of course! Yeah, I was uh, umm Thigh Mega Tampon.

utterance.speaker: Melissa
utterance.content: What one?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah! Y’know, we were really huge too, but then they had to shut us down when Regina Philange died of alcohol poisoning.

utterance.speaker: Melissa
utterance.content: Oh, isn’t a shame when one girl ruins it for the whole bunch?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Anyway, speaking of drinking too much. I was uh, tellin’ Phoebe about that one crazy night after the Sigma Chi luau where you and I uh, we made out.

utterance.speaker: Melissa
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Remember?! We—come on both had the sarongs on, and we had the-the coconut bikini tops…

utterance.speaker: Melissa
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: …we went back the house and we got really silly and we…we made out.

utterance.speaker: Melissa
utterance.content: Oh wow, Ray-ray I have no idea what you’re talking about.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Really?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ross is Batman!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, he did manage to keep his identity secret for a long time.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Rachel got Ross the tuxedo that Val Kilmer wore in Batman. Okay Batman is so much cooler than James Bond!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What are you talking about?! 007 has all those gadgets!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Batman has a utility belt!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: 007 has a fancy car!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Batman has the Batmobile!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: 007 gets all the ladies.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Batman has Robin! We get ESPN right?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: How about you go put on your 007 tuxedo and I’ll make you a nice martini.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Actually, I don’t like martinis.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: How about a Youhoo with a funny straw?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ooh, yum!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Listen, I know the invitation says 6:00, but does that mean that you want people to get there at six, or the show is gonna start right at six?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: The show?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Right. Right. The wedding, gotcha. But I mean, it’s gonna start a little late right? I mean, weddings start late. Right?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Have you ever been to one of my weddings?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ah. Yeah. Well look, the thing is it’s the same day as my niece’s christening and I really want my parents to be there in time to see me. ‘Cause my part’s just in the beginning I’m not even in the rest of the show—Wedding!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: The wedding starts at six.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay. Okay, I totally hear ya. Oo how about this? I vamp a little ‘til they get there?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You’ll vamp?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah! Yeah y’know, like warm up the crowd. Ask ‘em where they’re from. ‘Cause in Joey Tribbiani you get a minister and you get an entertainer. I’m a minis-tainer! There is no one better! There is no one greater!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: How can you not remember us kissing?!

utterance.speaker: Melissa
utterance.content: I don’t know. I don’t remember a lot of things that never happened.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wh… Come on! Remember? We were on the sleeping porch! We couldn’t stop giggling? And our coconuts kept knockin’ together?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, somewhere Joey’s head is exploding.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah—but come on—Listen, I’m sorry I don’t want to make you uncomfortable, but I told Phoebe that it happened and she doesn’t believe me.

utterance.speaker: Melissa
utterance.content: I’m sorry Ray-ray. I mean if I thought it happened I would say it. Maybe I passed out and you did stuff to me while I was sleeping.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Rachel, it’s okay. You don’t have to do this. I believe you. All right? Okay, if-if you say that you kissed Melissa, then you kissed Melissa.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Thank you Phoebe.

utterance.speaker: Melissa
utterance.content: She didn’t.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I know.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You just carry that around?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yes. I find it to be something of a conversation piece.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Between you and…

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Gunther. Hey-hey! Why don’t we put them on? Y’know get a picture of Batman and James Bond together.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I would but mine doesn’t fit. The pants are a little tight.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: A little tight? I could see double-oh and seven in those pants.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well that stinks. I was looking forward to us wearing our celebrity tuxes together.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, does that mean that you’re not going to wearing yours?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What are you kidding? It’s Batman’s tux!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Let me try it on!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, but just the jacket. Double-oh and seven are not gettin’ in there.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay. Holy double-vented comfort Batman! What’s this?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: An invitation for the At First Sight premiere? Oh my God! Val Kilmer didn’t wear this in Batman! He wore it to the premiere of some tooty-fruity love story where he played a blind guy!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Let me see that! Oh man!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: The only superpower you have is a slightly heightened sense of smell.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey! Uh, Monica? Chandler? Can I talk to you guys for a second?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All right that’s it, I give up! Whatever you want you can have it! You wanna sing a song? You wanna do a dance? You want your mom stand at the Alter and scream racial slurs? I don’t care!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No! No, I-I just wanna thank you guys for what you did for my parents, that was really sweet. They’re so happy they get to be a part of your special day.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, you’re welcome. And tell them we’re really glad they’re coming.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay. I will. Ohh! Check out what they got me to wear for the ceremony! Huh? I wear it like this when I marry you guys, and then this is for party time.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: It happened! I am telling you it happened!

utterance.speaker: Melissa
utterance.content: Okay. Well, it was great meeting you. And uh Rachel, I-I don’t think I’ll be calling you because umm, y’know you’ve gotten weird. Take care you guys.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?! Wait a minute! No wait a minute! Okay? Look, that night was the one wild thing I have ever done in my entire life, and I’m not gonna let you take that away from me! Okay, so if you don’t remember that, maybe you will remember this!

utterance.speaker: Melissa
utterance.content: My God! You love me!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Melissa
utterance.content: Of course I remember our kiss. I think about it all the time. I can still hear the coconuts knockin’ together I… I just didn’t want to tell you ‘cause I didn’t think that you’d return my love, and now that you have…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Whoa! Whoa-whoa-whoa-whoa! Whoa! Whoa!

utterance.speaker: Melissa
utterance.content: Aww, look who’s being suddenly shy. You can’t tell me you don’t feel what I feel. Nobody can kiss that good and not mean it.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I-I-I-I’m just…I’m just a good kisser!

utterance.speaker: Melissa
utterance.content: Shut up!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I’m sorry!

utterance.speaker: Melissa
utterance.content: Oh you don’t have to be sorry. I’m…I’m obviously kidding. I’m not in love with you. I’m not in love with her. I don’t hear coconuts banging together. Yeah, I don’t…picture your face when I make love to my boyfriend. Anyway, I gotta go. Eh…kiss good-bye? No? Okay.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wow! I mean I had no idea that that was gonna…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What the hell was that?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I just wanted to see what all the fuss was about.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: And?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I’ve had better.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: All right! I found one that fits!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well y’know what they say, the 23rd time’s the charm. Aww, look at you all handsome!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Whose is it?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh does it matter?! All that matters is that you look so handsome.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Whose is it?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I don’t want to say.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, come on! I don’t care! Come on! Whose is it?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Diane Keeton.
